php.ERR_SCRIPT_EXISTS_FUNCTION_NOT: Script exists but doesn't contain imported function name.
php.ERR_FAILED_TO_SAVE_SCRIPT: Datoteke skripta za metode poteka dela (workflow) ni bilo mogoče shraniti.
php.ERR_ILLEGAL_FIELD_VALUE: Za to vrsto polja je bila vnesena napačna vrednost. Ime polja:%s, modul:%s, vrednost:%s
php.ERR_VALUE_IS_TOO_LONG: Število znakov je presežena. Ime polja:%s, modul:%s, vrednost:%s
php.ERR_VALUE_IS_TOO_SHORT: Entered value is too short. Field name: %s, Module: %s, Value: %s
php.ERR_TO_MANY_FILES: Preveč prenesenih datotek - meja je bila presežena. Ime polja: %s, Modul: %s, Vrednost: %s
php.ERR_VALUE_CAN_NOT_BE_LESS_THAN_ZERO: Vrednost polja mora biti večja od nič. Ime polja:%s, modul:%s, vrednost:%s
php.ERR_NOT_ALLOWED_VALUE: Zaznana je napačna vrednost, prosimo da se obrnite na skrbnika
php.ERR_PASSWORD_HAS_ALREADY_BEEN_USED: To geslo je že uporabljeno. Sistem ne dovoljuje uporabe istega gesla iz varnostnih razlogov.
php.ERR_USER_EXISTS: Uporabnik z istim uporabniškim imenom in funkcijo že obstaja (%s)
php.ERR_DUPLICATE_LOGIN: Uporabnik s tem uporabniški imenom že obstaja.
php.ERR_NO_PERMISSIONS_FOR_THE_RECORD: Nimate dovoljenja, potrebna za ogled/urejanje tega zapisa. Če bi želeli imeti dovoljenje za ogled, se obrnite na skrbnika.
php.ERR_CONTENTS_VARIABLE_CANT_CALLED_FUNCTI: Vsebina spremenljivke (% s) se ne more zagnati kot funkcija
php.ERR_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS_NOT_ALLOWED: Posebni znaki, kot je %s, niso dovoljeni
php.ERR_FILE_CODE_INJECTION: File contains dangerous code and was rejected
php.ERR_FILE_XPACKET_CODE_INJECTION: Datoteka vsebuje nevarno kodo XPACKET in je bila zavrnjena
php.ERR_CURRENCY_TABLE_DOWNLOAD: Napaka med nalaganjem v tabeli menjalni tečaj.
php.ERR_CANNOT_CONNECT_TO_REMOTE: Napaka pri povezavi z oddaljenim strežnikom
php.ERR_ERROR_WHILE_SENDING_DATA: Error while sending data, there is probably some error/missing data.
php.ERR_PAID_FUNCTIONALITY: % je plačljiva funkcionalnost tato jo morate kupiti
php.ERR_TOKEN_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The token does not exist or has expired
php.ERR_TOKEN_NOT_EXECUTION_CONDITIONS: The token does not meet the conditions for execution
php.ERR_FUNCTION_NOT_FOUND_IN_CLASS: Function %s not found in class %s object
php.ERR_REQUIRED_VALUE_MISSING: The field value is missing or is not supported
php.ERR_DETECTED_ERRORS_CURRENT_RECORD: Problems or errors have been detected in this record. Please review the following message and modify the data accordingly.
php.ERR_DETECTED_ERRORS_WILL_DISAPPEAR: The error will disappear only after the appropriate mechanisms are activated once the correction is made. This may take several minutes depending on your configuration.
php.ERR_IMAP_CONNECTION: There was a problem accessing your e-mail account. Verify the correctness of the e-mail account settings.
php.ERR_REGISTER_FILES_PERMISSIONS: Incorrect permissions on files or directory %s
php.ERR_PLEASE_USE_LATIN_CHARACTERS: Please make sure to use Latin characters only
php.ERR_RECREATE_APP_ACCESS: The system has detected a change in the basic registration data. The add-ons you purchased may not be available. Please contact your provider in case of any issues.
